problematic_presets.description: Presets that consistently show only a single solid color

notes.identification: These presets were identified through manual testing
reasons: Some presets require specific audio levels to initialize
Some have broken equations that compile but don't render
Some depend on features not available in WebGL implementation
notes.testing: To identify problematic presets, look for those that remain black even after warmup period

audio_dependent_presets.description: Presets that only show visuals with audio input above threshold
audio_dependent_presets.notes: These presets need actual music playing, not silence
